step.description: This step is skipped if the procedure library is empty

condition.description: Checks whether the PROCLIB is empty

step.instructions: Run this step to copy the STC procedure to the PROCLIB.

step.name: run_stc
step.title: Start the Zowe instance
step.description: This step starts the Zowe instance
step.instructions: Run this step to start the Zowe instance. If you want to start the instance manually (e.g. after IPL), you can do it with the following command: sh "${instance-zowe_instance_path}/bin/zowe-start.sh" You can also start the instance using the following MVS command: /S ZWESVSTC INSTANCE='${instance-zowe_instance_path}',JOBNAME=${instance-ZOWE_PREFIX}${instance-ZOWE_INSTANCE}SV To learn more about the task and how to stop it, please refer to the documentation at docs.zowe.org
